Review: i am writing review after using 4 days  pros  1 design is awesome feel very light weight and very sleek design feel very comfortable and have perfect grip 2 camera is perfect you can capture perfect picture in this price range 3 network connection is perfect having no any issue related network 4 display  its ok needs some more colour detailing in this price range but overall perfectthere is no much more use of peak brightness its all are advertising propoganda 5 heating  after playing more than 1 hrs of bgmi face no any heating issue little bit hit which is accepted   cons  1 battery backup is little bit disappointed need some more improvement its seem as like 5000 mah battery i has been using poco m2 pro since 4 yrs 5000mahwho provide same battery backup 2 haptic is not as like oneplus provideneed some more improvement 3 fingerprint response is slightly slow you need to place your finger for some second to unlock and fingerprint sensor is bottom of the screen which quite difficult to open the lock 4 speaker loudness is low and provide single stereo speaker which is quite disappointing at least give dual stereo speaker but the voice clarity is good 5 quality of back cover is low

Product Name: vivo T3 Ultra (Lunar Gray, 256 GB)  (8 GB RAM)
Review: very powerful processor impressive cameras front and rear could even be a contender to s23 fe except probably only video stabilization curved but stunning and crisp display and reliable battery after optimizationupdates  after a few days of usage i can tell that the phone is pretty powerful in terms of performance i did not experience any lags the display is stunning and clear but the curved screen is not something i am a big fan of generally the cameras are really good with detailed shots turning up on both front and rear cameras there are also a ton of features to be explored even the videos are decent thanks to ois and stabilization night mode also seemed quite powerful if you take into account both front and rear cameras it might as well be a contender to samsung s23 fe battery life initially seemed poor as though it were draining fast but with a few personal tweaks and perhaps updates the battery life has gotten better now it feels reliable  my only complaints would be the lack of a hybrid sim slot for microsd support a 35 mm jack would have been nice  overall a very balanced and capable smartphone to buy in the 30k price segment you can compare this one with motorola edge 50 pro samsung s23 fe one plus nord 4 and realme gt 6t before buying this one because they are all very good as well

Product Name: vivo T3 Ultra (Frost Green, 128 GB)  (8 GB RAM)
Review: very powerful processor impressive cameras front and rear could even be a contender to s23 fe except probably only video stabilization curved but stunning and crisp display and reliable battery after optimizationupdates  after a few days of usage i can tell that the phone is pretty powerful in terms of performance i did not experience any lags the display is stunning and clear but the curved screen is not something i am a big fan of generally the cameras are really good with detailed shots turning up on both front and rear cameras there are also a ton of features to be explored even the videos are decent thanks to ois and stabilization night mode also seemed quite powerful if you take into account both front and rear cameras it might as well be a contender to samsung s23 fe battery life initially seemed poor as though it were draining fast but with a few personal tweaks and perhaps updates the battery life has gotten better now it feels reliable  my only complaints would be the lack of a hybrid sim slot for microsd support a 35 mm jack would have been nice  overall a very balanced and capable smartphone to buy in the 30k price segment you can compare this one with motorola edge 50 pro samsung s23 fe one plus nord 4 and realme gt 6t before buying this one because they are all very good as well

Product Name: vivo T3 Ultra (Frost Green, 256 GB)  (8 GB RAM)
Review: very powerful processor impressive cameras front and rear could even be a contender to s23 fe except probably only video stabilization curved but stunning and crisp display and reliable battery after optimizationupdates  after a few days of usage i can tell that the phone is pretty powerful in terms of performance i did not experience any lags the display is stunning and clear but the curved screen is not something i am a big fan of generally the cameras are really good with detailed shots turning up on both front and rear cameras there are also a ton of features to be explored even the videos are decent thanks to ois and stabilization night mode also seemed quite powerful if you take into account both front and rear cameras it might as well be a contender to samsung s23 fe battery life initially seemed poor as though it were draining fast but with a few personal tweaks and perhaps updates the battery life has gotten better now it feels reliable  my only complaints would be the lack of a hybrid sim slot for microsd support a 35 mm jack would have been nice  overall a very balanced and capable smartphone to buy in the 30k price segment you can compare this one with motorola edge 50 pro samsung s23 fe one plus nord 4 and realme gt 6t before buying this one because they are all very good as well

Product Name: vivo T3 Ultra (Lunar Gray, 128 GB)  (8 GB RAM)
Review: very powerful processor impressive cameras front and rear could even be a contender to s23 fe except probably only video stabilization curved but stunning and crisp display and reliable battery after optimizationupdates  after a few days of usage i can tell that the phone is pretty powerful in terms of performance i did not experience any lags the display is stunning and clear but the curved screen is not something i am a big fan of generally the cameras are really good with detailed shots turning up on both front and rear cameras there are also a ton of features to be explored even the videos are decent thanks to ois and stabilization night mode also seemed quite powerful if you take into account both front and rear cameras it might as well be a contender to samsung s23 fe battery life initially seemed poor as though it were draining fast but with a few personal tweaks and perhaps updates the battery life has gotten better now it feels reliable  my only complaints would be the lack of a hybrid sim slot for microsd support a 35 mm jack would have been nice  overall a very balanced and capable smartphone to buy in the 30k price segment you can compare this one with motorola edge 50 pro samsung s23 fe one plus nord 4 and realme gt 6t before buying this one because they are all very good as well

Product Name: vivo V30 Pro 5G (Classic Black, 256 GB)  (8 GB RAM)
Review: writing this review after a months use the only pros that ive experienced on this phone are the superior camera and display quality but a lot of scope for improvement when it comes to user experience os functionality processor performance sound quality and battery performanceive used miui and oxygen os before and when it comes to user friendliness funtouch is still way behind them even at this price range definitely not a gaming phone there are slight lags even when i play very basic games like altos odyssey so you can imagine what will happen if youre a heavy gamer a huge letdown when it comes to sound quality as it has mono speaker at this price range i tried playing the same song on this phone and my old redmi note 9 pro maxwhich costed 18k and at full volume note 9 totally overpowered the sound coming out from this device sound quality gets better with enhancement options only when youre using your earphones  personal verdict go for this phone if the camera and display are your primary attraction and you want a phone that looks sleek and premium on your hands also i got it at a fair amount of discount almost 10k so that helps as a consolation  nb terrible delivery experience flipkart took a lifetime to deliver the product as it was an exchange offer

Product Name: vivo T2 Pro 5G (New Moon Black, 256 GB)  (8 GB RAM)
Review: best phone at this price range writing this review after 3 weeks of usage i have been a long loyal user of samsung and was hesitant to buy vivo my wife convinced me to buy vivo somehow ill compare it with my earlier samsung m30s which was approx in a similar price range 22k while vivo was for 25k  1 looks it is stunning in your hand no other phone can come close to this sleek curve display marble finish back cover the flashlight is in a ring shape when you on it in the dark it looks stunningwether its day or night this thing in your hand would steal the show 2 display wider larger brighter better than samsung in the price range of 2530k 3 battery 1 full charge remains around 1517hourswhich is better than most of the phones in this range also fast charging in 3035mins goes from 0100 in samsung i had to have at least 230hrs recharge for full charge and battery used to drain in 1012hrs of normal usage 4 performance  no lag issues so smooth to use i have transferred all my data from my earlier samsung handset and yet it is working smoothly while my samsung had started to lag and process slowly this is with every samsung of 30k below price range since it is too early im keeping my fingers crossed as of now im very happy with my decision to switch to vivo lets see after 56 months of usage

Product Name: vivo T2 Pro 5G (New Moon Black, 256 GB)  (8 GB RAM)
Review: i am writing this review after using the phone more than 10 days my opinion regarding the phone is pros display amoled curved display is mesmerizing display is clearly visible in direct sunlight camera camera is very good it takes vivid images in the daylight  night camera is above average performance performance is super fast apps opening time is very fast design design is very attractive glass panel at the back is very worthy the phone is very light weight it weighs only 175 grams moreover the phone very slim only 736 mm charging charging time is very fast it takes only 57 minutes to charge it completely call recording you can record call without informing the person on the other end cons battery with medium usage with bluetooth hotspots and mobile data on with always display on it lasts only 8 hours while my previous phone lasted for almost a day battery heats up a little bit with heavy usage although it is not a matter of concern  software the software is lag free  but i am missing some features  themes are not free  my opinion at this price point overall it is a complete package you can go for it

Product Name: vivo T2 Pro 5G (New Moon Black, 256 GB)  (8 GB RAM)
Review: honest review after using this smartphone for 1 week  1 performance  this device is a beast when it comes to performance no heating issues you can do gaming easily packed with amazing features 2 display  display is mind blowing the colour it produces is close to natural and little on the saturated side if you watch a lot of series and movies youll love the display 3 design  the in hand feeling of this device is amazing its super slim and super light feels premium and top notch 4 camera  you can expect a great camera with a lot of detailing and the night option produces very good images 5 battery  when you look at the specs youll find that the back up will not be up to the mark but trust me the software optimisation is on point if you are a regular user who uses it for normal usage then it will give you backup for almost 15 days but if you are a gaming and streaming user the screen time will be 810 hours easily the plus point is 66w flash charger which will charge your device from 0100 in 50 minutes maximum conclusion i recommend this device to every kind of user who is looking for a beast under 25k vivo has done a great job just dont think about the competition and go for it the biggest competitor is moto edge which has battery drainage issue

Product Name: vivo T2 Pro 5G (New Moon Black, 256 GB)  (8 GB RAM)
Review: i recently acquired my new phone and i must say it has exceeded my expectations in terms of performance features and overall value for money heres a breakdown of its impressive features  1 display the phone boasts a vibrant and crisp display making every video and image a pleasure to view the colors are rich and the clarity is topnotch providing an immersive visual experience  2 performance powered by a robust processor this phone delivers seamless performance whether multitasking or running resourceintensive apps it handles everything effortlessly ensuring a smooth and responsive user experience  3 battery life one of the standout features is its exceptional battery life with efficient power management i can go through a full day of heavy usage without worrying about running out of battery this is a gamechanger for users who are constantly on the move  4 camera the camera setup on this phone is impressive capturing sharp and detailed photos the various modes and ai enhancements contribute to stunning shots in different lighting conditions its a reliable companion for capturing lifes moments  5 design and build quality the phones design is sleek and modern with attention to detail in every aspect the build quality feels premium providing a sturdy and durable feel in hand the ergonomics ensure a comfortable grip  6 software and updates the device runs on the latest version of the operating system and regular updates ensure that it stays optimized and secure the user interface is intuitive making navigation a breeze  7 connectivity with fast and reliable connectivity options including 4g5g capabilities wifi and bluetooth staying connected has never been smoother the phone seamlessly integrates into my daily tech ecosystem  8 storage and expandability ample internal storage provides sufficient space for apps media and files additionally the option for expandable storage ensures that i wont run out of space anytime soon  in conclusion my new phone stands out as a true valueformoney device it excels in all key areas offering a premium experience without breaking the bank whether youre a tech enthusiast or a casual user this phone is a solid choice that ticks all the boxes

Review: feedback on mobile performance issue  subject issue with mobile hanging and performance  dear oppo reno 12 pro  i recently purchased a new mobile model and have been experiencing performance issues that are affecting its usability the phone frequently hangs becomes unresponsive and does not operate as smoothly as expected from a new device this happens even when running basic apps and it greatly disrupts my experience  here are the key issues i am facing  frequent freezing or hanging of the device  slow response time when switching between apps  occasional crashes during normal usage   i have already tried common troubleshooting steps like restarting the phone closing background apps clearing cache and checking for software updates unfortunately these actions have not resolved the problem  given that this is a new phone i kindly request your assistance in resolving this issue or suggest possible solutions if needed i am open to a replacement or repair under warranty  thank you for your attention to this matter i look forward to your prompt response  sincerely sameer khan

Review: feedback on mobile performance issue  subject issue with mobile hanging and performance  dear oppo reno 12 pro  i recently purchased a new mobile model and have been experiencing performance issues that are affecting its usability the phone frequently hangs becomes unresponsive and does not operate as smoothly as expected from a new device this happens even when running basic apps and it greatly disrupts my experience  here are the key issues i am facing  frequent freezing or hanging of the device  slow response time when switching between apps  occasional crashes during normal usage   i have already tried common troubleshooting steps like restarting the phone closing background apps clearing cache and checking for software updates unfortunately these actions have not resolved the problem  given that this is a new phone i kindly request your assistance in resolving this issue or suggest possible solutions if needed i am open to a replacement or repair under warranty  thank you for your attention to this matter i look forward to your prompt response  sincerely sameer khan

Review: feedback on mobile performance issue  subject issue with mobile hanging and performance  dear oppo reno 12 pro  i recently purchased a new mobile model and have been experiencing performance issues that are affecting its usability the phone frequently hangs becomes unresponsive and does not operate as smoothly as expected from a new device this happens even when running basic apps and it greatly disrupts my experience  here are the key issues i am facing  frequent freezing or hanging of the device  slow response time when switching between apps  occasional crashes during normal usage   i have already tried common troubleshooting steps like restarting the phone closing background apps clearing cache and checking for software updates unfortunately these actions have not resolved the problem  given that this is a new phone i kindly request your assistance in resolving this issue or suggest possible solutions if needed i am open to a replacement or repair under warranty  thank you for your attention to this matter i look forward to your prompt response  sincerely sameer khan

Product Name: OPPO Reno10 Pro 5G (Silvery Grey, 256 GB)  (12 GB RAM)
Review: awesome phone  i am writing the review after almost a week of use pros 1 very good design both in front and back 2 lightweight and feels premium in your hand 3 beautiful display treat to your eyes amoled curved screen and 120hz adaptive refresh rate adds to its beauty 4 front camera beautiful sony imx 709 really takes beautiful pics in every condition back camera main camera really works even in low light condition and 32 mp telephoto lens is not a gimmick it really helps in taking clear pics of distant objects 5 ir blaster nfc is there but not making big difference for me  cons 1 processor 778g really in 39k feels like 20k processor to me even a lower priced reno 10 has a better clocked 26ghz processor i was expecting at least dimensity 8200 in this price range 2 single speaker at this price it should have been dolby atmos 3 battery 4600 mah is ok ok for me as i am not a gamer and for normal day to day use it lasts one day easily but 5000 could have been better 4 no ip rating in this price range is a big disappointment  even after the drawbacks i gave it a 5 for its design display and camera i got the phone at a good bank discount and a handsome exchange offer i preferred it over nord 3 for its camera performance and nord 3s display problem overall its a good buy
